name: router
description: A react router hook layer for https://github.com/Kodemon/router
author: Christoffer Rodvik <christoffer@kodemon.net>

scripts.setup: npm run setup:router && npm run setup:react
scripts.build: npm run build:router && npm run build:react
scripts.test: npm run test:router && npm run test:react
scripts.publish: npm run publish:router && npm run publish:react
